Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>, wake up! Something terrible has
happened!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Jonas just informed me that...
<MOJI0> has died of illness.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I entrusted this farm and all the lives on it into
your care. I'm very disappointed that you allowed
this to happen.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What a terribly cruel fate you've sentenced it to!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
How could you have neglected the poor thing
so? I'm sure it must have suffered. If only you'd
noticed in time and given it medicine...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...*sigh* What's done is done, I suppose. The
important thing to do now is to bury
<MOJI0> with respect.
<PAGE>
We will bury it in our animal graveyard outside of
town, so that it may rest in peace.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Let's say a short prayer...
for <MOJI0>'s departed soul.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, then, if you'll excuse me...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I hope you continue to take loving
care of your animals, out of kindness and
respect.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I think it's time for us to go back now.
